biocontainers.name: patman
biocontainers.summary: Patman searches for short patterns in large dna databases, allowing for approximate matches. it is optimized for searching for many small pattern at the same time, for example microarray probes.

biotools.summary: Patman searches for short patterns in large DNA databases, allowing for approximate matches. It is optimized for searching for many small pattern at the same time, for example microarray probes.

bioschemas.name: PatMaN
bioschemas.summary: Patman searches for short patterns in large DNA databases, allowing for approximate matches. It is optimized for searching for many small pattern at the same time, for example microarray probes.
